name: @storagehub-sdk/root
description: Workspace root for StorageHub SDK monorepo

scripts.build: pnpm run build:core && pnpm run build:msp-client
scripts.coverage: pnpm --filter ./core run coverage && pnpm --filter ./msp-client run coverage
scripts.test: pnpm run test:core && pnpm run test:msp-client
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter ./core run typecheck && pnpm --filter ./msp-client run typecheck
